ygData.subject: Re: FRune of One Eye (Bottom Portion)
ygData.msgSnippet: I guess I need to be more specific..  Every listing I ve seen (an email posted here an a couple of websites) that lists the details of the quests talk about
ygData.messageBody:
I guess I need to be more specific.. Every listing I've seen (an email
posted here an a couple of websites) that lists the details of the quests
talk about the top and middle. The bottom by the way is from Droon, (not
Froon or Choon). So I'm looking for exact details what the bottom part is
used for.

Thanks

Slyde
----- Original Message -----
From: Evan S. Dictor <esdictor@...>
To: <eqbards@onelist.com>
Sent: Saturday, October 23, 1999 3:25 PM
Subject: Re: [eqbards] FRune of One Eye (Bottom Portion)


> From: "Evan S. Dictor" <esdictor@...>
>
> The Rune of the One Eye (bottom) from Froon and the one (top) from Choon
are
> both part of the Bard (Lambent) armor quests.
>
> > Got this [Rune of One Eye (Bottom Portion)] off of Droon last night -
> checked websites, etc -
> > but couldn't find any reference to it - anyone know if it's used
anywhere?
>
> > Please send submissions for the eqbards newsletter to toren@...
with the subject lol.
>
